website_summaries.verdict: The JBL E45BT are comfortable, bass-forward wireless on-ear headphones that will appeal to anyone seeking a little extra rumble in their music.
pros: Powerful, boosted bass response matched with crisp highs
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Sculpted sound signature not for purists

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of wireless headphones. Love not having to mess around with a cable. So far so good, excellent battery life and sound is good enough for commuting. A couple of niggles, the band is very tight and wearing glasses at the same time becomes uncomfortable after 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months. Didn’t want to get another one.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on the way to work and at the gym (though it’s not really the best for running, it holds but it does kind of slip) I do take care of it and when it’s not being used it’s in my bag safe and sound. I’ve never dropped it or slammed it but for some reason the right headphone stopped working. It really annoyed me. Only good thing about it is I rarely charged it. Rarely. However it wasn’t as loud as I thought it would be. On the underground on full blast I can still hear the female voice saying ‘the next stop is...’
customer_reviews.author: Kris Abbey Rogero

customer_reviews.title: Al great but occasionally sound’s breaking up
customer_reviews.text: This has better and powerful sound than my Bose headphone. JBL does it, always good. I rated this as 4 stars because sound breaks up sometimes and that annoys me. Couldn’t work out when or why but it happens. Otherwise you will love the look of it, very comfortable and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: ilkay holt

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Headphones do not operate correctly when connected with Bluetooth, sound quality is very poor and has a constant echo with a rough distorted sound. I set this up several times but nothing worked to correct this problem. Also volume when connected with Bluetooth is very low even with max 100%. When connected by cable they work reasonably well but I really only purchased this item for use with Bluetooth connection so not at all happy with them, no better than my basic Tesco headphones costing £15.
customer_reviews.author: Different Name.

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: was more or less ok with iphone, but absolutely unusable with sony TV - sound starting with delay, crackling, loosing connection. Every other bt headphones I have worked with tv absolutely fine, even cheap no name bought ages ago. also really tight on a head, so not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Affordable headphones. Ideal for listening to radio on my phone when out and about, in the garden etc. As far as I can see there is no indicator to show when they need recharging so assume I’ll find out one day when they stop working! The switches aren’t particularly easy, especially if wanting to adjust volume while wearing them, but this might just be something I need to get used to. I love the way they collapse down making them easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price long battery life, easy to connect. The cons: buttons on the edge not conviniant at all. Size of speakers a bit too small. First fit well the head so you can forget to run with it or go to the gtm The previous version of those headphone was better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexbass

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Good price & quick on/off switch. Basic 3 button play/pause vol+-. Good for monitoring with cable in a club & home setting, also good for walking with bluetooth. Detachable 3.5mm cable you can leave plugged into a device at home while you walk. will fold into itself for easy storage. Not suitable for running, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair, good battery life, not a fantastic product though. The sound quality is quite acceptable but nothing to blow you away. I payed £60, and that's a decent price, but for a higher price, go check something else. Oh and... if you have a rather large head, don't even think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Titus C

customer_reviews.title: Failing, and struggling to get adequate warranty support from Harman
customer_reviews.text: These were great until the on/off switch started to fail. I applied to Harman EMEA, under the warranty, only to be eventually told that they do not support warranties for the UK. I'm pretty sure the UK is part of Europe, the Middle East, and Asia, but in these turbulent political times, who knows?! I'm still working on getting them repaired or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Garratt

customer_reviews.title: Average - slips off head - bass distorts at higher volume
customer_reviews.text: - As others have mentioned, they do slip off the top of your head especially if you are working out (lying down, bending forward), this can become really annoying. - Sounds quality is ok, I expected better. The bass is rubbish they don’t pack much punch and once you turn the volume up the bass distorts. They were only £70 and I only use them in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortwble but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality of sound, comfortable but getting a bit heavy after few hours of listenning comparing After nearly two years left ear cup get faulty and there was a problem with getting JBL service, however Amazon sent me replacement very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tawl

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good soundsystem, I bought this for the gym. Amazing battery life with really good base. But the huge disappointment came from the fact that they slip. You can't run in these, they slip when you do deadlifts or move your head slightly. So these would be perfect for travel such as London underground or staying somewhere fixed where there isn't much movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very good
customer_reviews.text: Really good battery life, lasts a few days...playing for 4-5hrs at a time. Sound is exactly as is to be expected of JBL...excellent!! The only minor thing is the flimsy-seeming on/off sliding switch...we will see how it stands up to time in use. All other aspects of these headphones are really very good!!
customer_reviews.author: MR B REEVE

customer_reviews.title: Item looks more line Used Acceptable item rather than Used Very good
customer_reviews.text: Was more like a used acceptable item...Should have gotten a brand new one for a couple more quid...It had been used extensively & was dirty & the ear cups stank...It was part of Valentine’s Day gifts for my wife so I tried my best to clean it up but it still looks worn....Hasn’t been used yet since gift was just presented today....Only then will I be able to rate the performance....Not impressed so far really as was advertised as used very good!
customer_reviews.author: MikeyMikes

customer_reviews.title: Falling off the head
customer_reviews.text: Kept falling off at the gym. Also didn't stick to the head properly so I had to turn the sound all the way up and everyone could hear what I was listejing to. Literally so unhappy with them. Returning
customer_reviews.author: k.o.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Average quality headphones. The sound is ok but not as good as I’d expect/know it from JBL. Just as good as the £50 headphones of the same brand (T450BT). Would probably recommend to spend £100 more on higher quality headphones or go for the t-series. Battery life however is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I bought them for Christmas and my husband has used them quite a lot and still hasn’t had to recharge them. He’s very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Discovery

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Bought as a gift for my 18year old son in uni. He can be fussy but he was impressed. Love that it's not too big on ears. Arrived on time and in original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Spyro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Jan sales to use in the gym cos the lead on my beats was doing my head in. Can't fault them! Great sound, very simple to set up and very light / comfortable. No comment yet about battery life as I've only just really started using (4 x sessions at gym) but so far so good. Definiftely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: peter b

customer_reviews.title: Good product for good value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, compact, good sound & quality & decent noise cancellation. Easy to pinch your skin when folding up & bit tight on ears (maybe just when new, hope they get better) causing sore ears after more than an hour of use
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Nice sound and very comfortable. I did find that after a while (about a year) the battery doesn’t last as long but not by much so wasn’t an issue. If recommend buying :)
customer_reviews.author: Joel D

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, with hard plastic controls that don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cheaply made. The slide button to turn on Bluetooth did not slide. The controls are made of hard plastic. Poor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good sound and battery lift. A gift for a family member who loved them
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great range, quality
customer_reviews.text: These are superb! Great range, quality, comfort, and battery life. Absolutely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 3 months of good care! 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from here and didn’t last 3 months!😡😡😡😡 I have learnt the lesson, buy from a shop and have a year guarantee. ✅
customer_reviews.author: Nushinha

customer_reviews.title: Wireless sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these, as they are comfortable and the sound quality is really good. Once paired automatically switches your Bluetooth on when you switch on and same when off
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Stovell

customer_reviews.title: features
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was the best and the comfort was a little rough but it is really good and is better than beats and Bose and all the others over ear headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money/sound quality/product
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered within the hour slot as indicated on the very helpful updates on delivery schedule I received. If you were not going to be in you were allowed to change time slot/drop off etc. Very comfy headphones and good sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed for the price. Sound cancelling excellent. Sound quality very good. Arrived promptly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MR G D PEEL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They are great value for money and super easy to use. Great sound quality, better than some other more fashionable brands
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and I'm impressed. Design is simple but pretty nice, fits very well on my ears and the sound quality, yeah.. for this price, I think it's amazing. I'm gonna try them tomorrow in the gym and write down below first impressions.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, ok grip
customer_reviews.text: I very like the fact, that they are fordable and I can listen to anything via cabel and Bluetooth. It works perfectly. They are made to use them in a static position, because when you lean forward, they fall.
customer_reviews.author: Bartłomiej Urbański

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, medium level comfort
customer_reviews.text: Amazon replaced the first set I purchased because the left side of the headphones failed after 6 months of light use. Apart from that the headphones produce top quality sound; the comfort level could have been better though.
customer_reviews.author: Kakogiannis Dimitris

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is another great buy from JBL. Durable, sleek design, very easy to use and travel with. Sound quality is great and Bluetooth range is great when connecting to another device.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: really good headphones but..
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy this product but the sound cuts out on occasion not for long enough for me to be annoyed so only for a second or two but i still have noticed. i would still recomend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone to my daughter and now she can not live without it. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ticiana Larocca

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of headphones with a jack for a cable when the bluetooth runs out which is very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashika Morar

customer_reviews.title: Best buy to date!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say a bad thing about these, one or the best buys ever...sound quality is superb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn't know what to expect but sound quality is exactly what you would expect from jbl loud and crisp sound quality havent looked back
customer_reviews.author: Nstar

customer_reviews.title: Sound and stability
customer_reviews.text: With ease I can run and do jump rope and enjoy listening to high quality music , awesome purchase , especially for this price !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with these headphones. Such good quality and the battery lasts as listed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smoker

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphone it self felt very premium and the sound quality was amazing, and it was very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Headband very large, they don t stay fit at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with these, they don t stay fit, the headband got very large falling off your head very easily
customer_reviews.author: Jolietan

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound deep bass sound highly recomend thease ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound very comfie good size very good value for money great down the gym dont fall off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not good
customer_reviews.text: Generally it's good but time to times make a strange noise
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very happy With these. Use Them at the gym. Sound is very good. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Use
customer_reviews.text: The left side of headphones stopped working after 2 months even with the wire it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wittey

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and also the sound is very cool
customer_reviews.author: TMVRL

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Was plesantly surprised by sound quality and comfort of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Good, fast connection to any device. Incredible voice and bass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and clear sound but could be more comfortable and lay in the head better...
customer_reviews.author: erez5928

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are very good gives absolute great bass only problem I have is, it doesn't support htc phones if u connect it with cable only Bluetooth. But please do not compare them with Bose or beats.
customer_reviews.author: Anslee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good, it hearts a little if you lose for a long time, such as overseas travel.
customer_reviews.author: Waldemar

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: the Headphones has Great sound and comfortable also a really good price its totaly worth it thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Hs

product_meta.title: JBL Harman E45 Bluetooth On-Ear Headphone - Black
product_meta.description: Sound that moves you, when you’re on the move JBL E45BT on-ear wireless headphones bring the signature sound of JBL right to your ears. The E45BT is one of our most versatile products ever, featuring up to 16 hours of battery life, an innovative, stylish fabric headband and ergonomic on-ear design. This means that your entertainment continues and your fun factor gets amped up no matter what you’re doing – working, commuting, or just making your way around town. You can seamlessly switch from music on your portable device to a ring from your phone, for example, so that you never miss a call. With a sleek appearance, various colors and the added convenience of a detachable cable with remote and microphone, you’ll never want to be without your E45BT headphones. They’ll cheer up your day with color and fun. General Specifications Plug3.5mm Dynamic driver40mm Frequency response20Hz – 20kHz Impedance32 Battery lifetime16hr BT type4 Warranty1 Years Whats in the box: 1 pair of E45BT headphones 1 Detachable cable 1 Charging cable Warning card Warranty card Safety sheet QSG
feature_bullets: JBL Signature Sound Signature JBL sound delivered by powerful 40mm drivers, in a sleek, stylish design
Up to 16-hour battery life Enjoy an entire day or more of wireless audio without having to plug your headphones back in to charge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars951 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
